text: ATHENS, May 12 OTE Telecom, Greeces biggest telecoms operator, on Wednesday posted higher first-quarter core profit, helped by growing mobile business at home.OTE Telecom, 46% owned and managed by Deutsche Telecom , said core earnings (EBITDA) reached 301 million euros ($365.08 million) in the first quarter, up from 296.5 million euros in the first quarter last year. ($1 = 0.8245 euros) (Reporting by Angeliki Koutantou)
